group_1.textLeft: Alright~ Now that Torayamachi and Ryuugasaki are @finally at it,
we of Janomiya need to get moving to take @them both out~

group_1.textRight: Aye!

group_1.textLeft: Hikaru, I need you to go undercover with one @of the teams.
Which would you prefer?

group_1.textRight: Since I deserted Ryuugasaki, I've gotta @go with Torayamachi.
Don't think I'll have any issues with it, either.

group_1.textLeft: Thanks to Yuna Kureha's leadership, living as a @Magical Girl in her gang isn't too bad at all.
I'd say it's Easy Mode~

group_1.textRight: But...

group_1.textLeft: But what~?

group_1.textRight: I really don't like the way we do things here...

group_1.textLeft: Ooh, @I'm always up for honest opinions~

group_1.textRight: It doesn't sit right with me, pretending to be a friend @to someone only to kill them later...
How do I say this? I don't feel like it's somethin' a decent person would do...

group_1.textLeft: You're pretty naive for a Magical Girl living in a @Hard Mode stage like this city~

group_1.textRight: Am I...?

group_1.textLeft: You know, everyone on my team has had their @hands dirtied~
We started with pure intentions, but that's been @soiled~
If we tried to fight fairly, we'd be wiped out in one strike.
Let's say we played on Hard Mode like that, @and got a Game Over.
After that, the older Magical Girls would definitely @turn this town into a rotten place.
That's why we should do anything we can to @keep that from happening and get a Happy End,
even if the methods are dirty. Don't you think?

group_1.textRight: So we can't trust in Torayamachi or Ryuugasaki, eh...
You mentioned that everyone here is fifteen or younger.
Does that have somethin' to do with all of this?

group_1.textLeft: Of course it does~
Janomiya was originally formed by refugees from @other gangs.
Aaaall of us were exploited by the older @Magical Girls~
They'd attack us, the same way you were attacked @the night we met.
They took so much from us...
That's why we're gonna take it all back~

group_1.textRight: Using dirty strats is fine if it's to take back what was stolen from you...
And for the sake of our future happiness...
That's your mindset, huh...

group_1.textLeft: It makes sense, doesn't it~?

group_1.textRight: I mean...
I still don't think it's right to do this stuff just for the @sake of winning.
But since it's for the sake of avenging the weak, @I can go along with it.

group_1.textLeft: I'm glad to hear it~
Alright then, there are a few Janomiya girls in Torayamachi right now.
One of them will take you to their HQ and introduce you. Does that sound good~?

group_1.textRight: Aye!

group_1.textLeft: By the way, Hikaru, how long have you been a @Magical Girl?

group_1.textRight: Um... For a while, but I just moved to Futatsugi @recently.

group_1.textLeft: Damn, it sucks that you had to move here~

group_1.textRight: Yeah...

group_1.textLeft: I'll give you a little tip, innocent angel~

group_1.textRight: What's that...?

group_1.textLeft: Think of this as a game you're playing on Very Hard Mode...
The objective is to survive.
We're all just playing a survival game right now...

group_1.textRight: Huh...?

group_1.textLeft: Oh, sorry if I confused you a bit.
Tehe~
I just wanted to help you relax a little.

group_1.textRight: Ah, I appreciate it...
